item.filter: Interface Intel(R) Ethernet Connection (12) I219-V(Ethernet): Bits received
Interface Intel(R) Ethernet Connection (12) I219-V(Ethernet): Bits sent

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    h.hostid, 
    h.host, 
    hi.location_lat AS latitude, 
    hi.location_lon AS longitude
FROM 
    hosts h
JOIN 
    host_inventory hi ON h.hostid = hi.hostid
WHERE 
    hi.location_lat IS NOT NULL 
    AND hi.location_lon IS NOT NULL;
